abstract: Novartis has taken a majority stake in Speedel Holding and offered to buy the rest in a deal valuing the company at 1.01 billion Swiss francs ($980 million), Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Novartis has taken a majority stake in Speedel Holding and offered to buy the rest in a deal valuing the company at 1.01 billion Swiss francs ($980 million), Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Novartis Pays $980 Million for Speedel Stake
